english.segment1: My body breaks beneath the weight. Of toil and trouble, fears and fights. Sickness in me, world against me. I cry to You tonight
english.segment2: Christ have mercy. Lord have mercy. Holy Healer. Strength within. Pass me not. Forsake me not, Lord
english.segment4: My enemies are whispering. They pray my name may die. So few to trust, so few are just. I cry to You tonight
english.segment6: Christ have mercy. Lord have mercy. Faithful Brother. Closest Friend. Pass me not
english.segment7: Forsake me not, Lord. Amen, Amen
english.segment8: My heart is dim, It's always been. I turn from what is right. Passions of youth tear me from truth. I cry to You tonight
english.segment10: Christ have mercy. Lord have mercy. Sinless Savior. Judge of men. Pass me not. Forsake me not, Lord. Amen, Amen
